User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the TioraS platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user was last updated.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product available for sale on the TioraS platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the product entity.

category.description: Category of the product (e.g., T-Shirt, Hoodie, Jacket, Accessories).

isNew.description: Indicates whether the product is a new arrival.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the product was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the product was last updated.

Design.title: Design
Design.description: Represents a user-generated or admin-created clothing design.

id.description: Unique identifier for the design entity.

prompt.description: The text prompt used to generate the design.

product.description: Product type associated with the design (e.g., Hoodie).

imageUrl.description: URL of the generated image for the design.

status.description: Status of the design (Draft, Reviewing, Approved, Rejected).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the design was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the design was last updated.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents a customer order placed on the TioraS platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the order entity.

status.description: Status of the order (Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the order was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the order was last updated.

OrderItem.title: OrderItem
OrderItem.description: Represents an individual item within an order.

id.description: Unique identifier for the order item entity.

quantity.description: Quantity of the product in the order item.

size.description: Size of the product in the order item.

color.description: Color of the product in the order item.

price.description: Snapshot price of the product at the time of purchase.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. Accessible only by the user themselves or an admin.

/users/{userId}/designs/{designId}.description: Stores user-created designs. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

/users/{userId}/orders/{orderId}.description: Stores user orders. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

/users/{userId}/orders/{orderId}/orderIt.description: Stores individual items within an order.

/roles_admin/{userId}.description: Documents in this collection grant admin access to the user. Existence of document grants admin access.
